secondPart: I want to dress up as a princess.
It is funny to see all the costumes.
We went to China to see the Great Wall.
I am going out to walk the dog.
I want to stay at home tonight and watch TV.
My brother goes to the park to play football.
They want to move to Australia in May.
I hope to see him tomorrow.
She plans to visit Spain next month.
I opened the curtains to see the street.
My biggest wish is to go on holidays.
I want to buy flowers for my mother.
I need to see a doctor.
I went to the shop to buy some food.
I hope to find my cat today.
I want to buy a car next week.
They are going to London to see the Big Ben.
We went to the cinema to watch a film.
He wants to eat some cake.
We're planning to go to New York.
I like getting up early in the morning.
My father started working as a lawyer yesterday.
They talked about getting a new car.
Buying Christmas presents is my favourite activity.
My sister is scared of being alone at night.
My mom is tired from working all day.
He was happy about winning the game.
Thanks for inviting me for your birthday party!
I hate waking up early.
I love eating biscuits.
I finished doing my homework five minutes ago.
I started running two years ago.
I brush my teeth before going to bed.
I'm going for a walk after finishing this test.
I don't like going to school.
I hate watching horror movies.
I started reading a new book yesterday.
Drawing is my hobby.
I haven't finished running yet.
I like going to the park.
